short_summary: Supply and delivery of Select Structural Douglas Fir timber
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Offerors may submit an offer at any point during the solicitation period.  Supply Arrangements will be issued in the order that compliant offers are received. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to establish a pre-qualified list of offerors to supply and delivery Select Structural Douglas Fir timber to Parks Canada locations in Ontario.  The period of the Supply Arrangement is from Issuance to 2029-03-31 inclusive.
full_summary:
================================
### Request for Supply Arrangement for Douglas Fir Timber

#### Solicitation Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Parks Canada Agency, invites interested suppliers to tender for the establishment of a pre-qualified list of offerors for the supply and delivery of Select Structural Douglas Fir timber to Parks Canada locations in Ontario.

#### Tender Details

* **Notice Reference**: WS4444227782
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Public Works and Government Services Canada, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau Quebec, K1A 0S5 Canada**
* **Publication Date**: February 20, 2024
* **Closing Date**: March 31, 2029 at 14:00:00
* **Anticipated Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Anticipated Contract End Date**: March 31, 2029

#### Supply Arrangement

This solicitation invites suppliers to submit an offer to supply and deliver Select Structural Douglas Fir timber to Parks Canada locations in Ontario. Supply Arrangements will be issued in the order that compliant offers are received.

#### Trade Agreements

Canada is a signatory to several trade agreements. The trade agreements relevant to this solicitation include Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and several others.

#### Regions of Opportunity

The supply and delivery of Select Structural Douglas Fir timber must be made to Parks Canada locations in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).

#### Contact Information

Inquiries and submissions must be directed to:

* David Barltrop
* PSPC/PWSC
* (Email): david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please see the notice URL for more information and to access the solicitation documentation.

**Note:** The closing date for this solicitation has been extended to allow offerors to submit their proposals at any time during the solicitation period. Supply Arrangements will be issued in the order that compliant offers are received. [1]

References:
[1] https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18848603?extsite=MTg4NDg2MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
